ygData.subject: Re: Newbie needs some help
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Yep... based on exp at the time and percentage based as far as I remember. So the higher in a level you are.. .the more exp you lose. Eep! 2)
ygData.messageBody:
1) Yep... based on exp at the time and percentage
based as far as I remember. So the higher in a level
you are.. .the more exp you lose. Eep!<br><br>2)
Animals... as a druid, I don't believe you lose exp.
However, usually you lose faction. Eventually, bears and
wolves that are normally amiable to you will probably go
up to you and bite ya. LOL.<br><br>Now there really
aren't that many animals that are amiable to you
anyway.. BUT... I do it b/c I don't like to kill bears and
wolves that are a druid's friend. Grin. Why kill things
that have good faction to ya?<br><br>Animal faction is
rough though. I've never noticed a msg about Animal
faction decreasing... but gradually.. they start to hate
ya bad!<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic
